panels.description: Number of GPUs assigned to the user.

targets.expr: count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Assigned GPUs

panels.description: Number of active GPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Active GPUs

panels.description: Number of idle GPUs under  the user.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle GPUs

panels.description: Number of NPUs assigned to the user.

targets.expr: count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Assigned NPUs

panels.description: Number of active GPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Active NPUs

panels.description: Number of idle GPUs under  the user.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle NPUs

targets.expr: count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)
count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0)

(count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))
count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)
count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0)

(count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all assigned GPUs to the user.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})

panels.title: Assigned GPU Utilization

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all assigned GPUs to the user over the selected time range.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})

panels.title: Assigned GPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>=0)

panels.title: Active GPU Utilization

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) assigned to the user over the selected time range.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>=0)

panels.title: Active GPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all assigned GPUs to the user.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})

panels.title: Assigned NPU Utilization

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all assigned NPUs to the user over the selected time range.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})

panels.title: Assigned NPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>=0)

panels.title: Active NPU Utilization

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) assigned to the user over the selected time range.

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>=0)

panels.title: Active NPU Utilization Over Time

targets.expr: avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0)
avg(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0) OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum (avg by (uuid) ((task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: GPU Memory

panels.description: Average NPU memory utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (uuid) ((task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: NPU Memory

panels.description: CPU usage per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(task_cpu_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"}) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Memory usage per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance) (task_mem_usage_byte{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Block In Rate per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance) (rate(task_block_in_byte{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Disk Read

panels.description: Block Out Rate per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance) (rate(task_block_out_byte{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Disk Write

panels.description: Network Inbound Rate per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance) (rate(task_net_in_byte{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Network In

panels.description: Network Outbound Rate per active GPU (>0%) assigned to the user.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance) (rate(task_net_out_byte{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid) (task_device_percent{username="$username",vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Network Out
Resource Per Active Device Over Time
